title.rendered: University of Victoria – UVic Online Application Portal 2024

content.rendered:
The University of Victoria – UVic Online Application Portal for International Students, UVic Application portal login, Application fees, Deadlines, Program requirements, and academic qualifications released online.

This is to inform all prospective students that the application portal to the University of Victoria 2024 is currently open for admission.

Summary of Contents

What to do before applying to the University of Victoria;

University of Victoria Program requirements 2024

Date and Deadlines | UVic Online Application 2024

Fees and Schedules

What to do before applying to the University of Victoria;

  • Review Academic Qualification
  • Review required programs
  • Check for Program Eligibility
  • Apply for admission before the deadline
  • Submit all academic transcript
  • Check admission status
  • Find out academic Calendar
  • Apply for a Study permit (for international students)

How to Apply for University of Victoria Admission

Apply to the University of Victoria in three steps:

  • Explore your required Program
  • Submit application
  • Accept and confirm your admission offer

University of Victoria Program requirements 2024

Review program requirements for your required courses/programs in the university online portal before applying for admission. Programs admissible in the University are listed for prospective students to select from.

Click here to learn more, University of Victoria Admission Application Requirement 2024 | UVic

 

Date and Deadlines | UVic Online Application 2024

The application is currently open

Fees and Schedules

Fees structures and schedule differs by program. Review all fees structure by following the University of Victoria online portal to view program fees and structures before application.

Apply Now | University of Victoria Admission 2024
